I wrote up my experience on using Theories specifically to test interface contracts.  This is a more elegant solution to the "Integration Tests are a Scam" presentation.


http://bloritsch.d-haven.net/articles/2010/02/09/using-junit-4-theories-to-test-contracts

Hopefully this puts the requests I had in perspective.  Let me know if there are some errors I need to address.
